name: The Redemption (Innovation Geeks)
description:
Title: The Redemption
Platform: PC
Genre: 2D-Platform, Action-Adventure
Rating: 10+ (ESRB)
Target: Casual gamer (aging from 12 - 30)
Release date: 26th June '21

Summary:

A 2D action-adventure platform game that challenges you to master the four elemental powers as Ragnar, a mysterious knight. Discover new worlds, face enemies and discover the true source of Ragnar's powers!

In this game the player controls a knight with a special connection to the four elemental types named Ragnar, who has an inventory with several weapons.

Ragnar must cross different levels, defeating a diverse set of enemies, overcoming obstacles and collecting orbs.

The  goal is to pass through all the levels, and discover the truth about his special powers.
